meanings.definition: A type of music or hymn sung or played during a religious procession.
meanings.sent1: The processionals at the church were so beautiful and calming.
meanings.sent2: The choir sang the processionals as they walked down the aisle.
meanings.sent3: The processionals played by the organ sounded like angels singing.
meanings.sent4: The haunting melody of the processionals echoed through the cathedral.
meanings.sent5: Listening to the processionals made me feel closer to a higher power.

meanings.definition: A group of people or vehicles moving forward in an orderly fashion, especially as part of a ceremony or event.
meanings.sent1: The processionals marched slowly in perfect harmony.
meanings.sent2: The royal processionals made their way through the cheering crowd.
meanings.sent3: The processionals of ducks waddled comically in a line.
meanings.sent4: The processionals of cars stretched as far as the eye could see.
meanings.sent5: The processionals of students entered the auditorium with pride.
